Quote.Author: Eric Hoffer
Quote.QuoteValue: People who bite the hand that feeds them usually lick the boot that kicks them

Quote.Author: Eric Hoffer
Quote.QuoteValue: We feel free when we escape - even if it be but from the frying pan to the fire

Quote.Author: Eric Hoffer
Quote.QuoteValue: It is easier to love humanity as a whole than to love one's neighbor

Quote.Author: Eric Hoffer
Quote.QuoteValue: Rudeness is a weak imitation of strength

Quote.Author: Eric Holder
Quote.QuoteValue: We are not programmed to bury our kids

Quote.Author: Eric Holder
Quote.QuoteValue: You keep your eyes on the prize, you try to do what's right, and eventually, you'll reach your goal

Quote.Author: Eric Holder
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have any intention of resigning

Quote.Author: Eric Holder
Quote.QuoteValue: You constantly hear about voter fraud... but you don't see huge amounts of vote fraud out there

Quote.Author: Eric Holder
Quote.QuoteValue: It pains me whenever there's the death of a law enforcement official

Quote.Author: Eric Holder
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a hard headed lawyer

Quote.Author: Eric Holder
Quote.QuoteValue: Any attorney general who is not an activist is not doing his or her job

Quote.Author: Eric Holder
Quote.QuoteValue: I think there are too many people in jail for too long and for not necessarily good reasons

Quote.Author: Eric Holder
Quote.QuoteValue: History simmers beneath the surface in more communities than just Ferguson

Quote.Author: Eric Holder
Quote.QuoteValue: The Constitution guarantees due process, not judicial process

Quote.Author: Eric Idle
Quote.QuoteValue: I love my family, my wife, my kids, my dogs, my home, my life. I am a very happy and contented man

Quote.Author: Eric Idle
Quote.QuoteValue: You look just like you!

Quote.Author: Eric Idle
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is a comedy when watching and a tragedy when experiencing. I try and share anything I have

Quote.Author: Eric Idle
Quote.QuoteValue: The dreadful thing about getting older is you cry at the drop of a hat

Quote.Author: Eric Idle
Quote.QuoteValue: No day of my life passes without someone saying the words 'Monty Python' to me. It's not bad

Quote.Author: Eric Idle
Quote.QuoteValue: It's such fun to take a lot of people and create something silly

Quote.Author: Eric Idle
Quote.QuoteValue: People can tell the truth much more freely when they're apparently lying

Quote.Author: Eric Idle
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always found bad films more enjoyable than good ones

Quote.Author: Eric Idle
Quote.QuoteValue: If the studios paid the artists, how would they ever be able to afford the executives?

Quote.Author: Eric Idle
Quote.QuoteValue: The Minister of Transport issued this appeal to motorists: Can anyone give him a lift to Leicester?

Quote.Author: Eric Ripert
Quote.QuoteValue: It took me all my life to learn how to salt a tomato

Quote.Author: Eric Ripert
Quote.QuoteValue: I just find the world very exciting and beautiful everywhere

Quote.Author: Eric Ripert
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm fascinated by Japanese cuisine

Quote.Author: Eric Ripert
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like it when I go to a restaurant and I'm lectured from the menu

Quote.Author: Eric Ripert
Quote.QuoteValue: The Cheesecake Factory's not that bad

Quote.Author: Eric Ripert
Quote.QuoteValue: Chefs are leaders in their own little world

Quote.Author: Eric Ripert
Quote.QuoteValue: I like working in silence

Quote.Author: Eric Ripert
Quote.QuoteValue: One thing I don't like is complaints

Quote.Author: Eric Ripert
Quote.QuoteValue: I am convinced that if you serve great value, people will come to you

Quote.Author: Eric Ripert
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very inspired by other cultures and very often use what I perceive to be exotic ingredients

Quote.Author: Eric Schlosser
Quote.QuoteValue: As a matter of fact, most cases of food poisoning are never linked back to their source

Quote.Author: Eric Schlosser
Quote.QuoteValue: I really like hamburgers and French fries, and I don't consider myself some kind of gourmand

Quote.Author: Eric Schlosser
Quote.QuoteValue: Hey, I used to eat at McDonald's: I liked the taste of the food, especially the French fries

Quote.Author: Eric Schlosser
Quote.QuoteValue: Yes, a cheeseburger and fries is probably my favourite meal. But I don't eat ground beef anymore

Quote.Author: Eric Schlosser
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been called communist, socialist, anti-American

Quote.Author: Eric Schlosser
Quote.QuoteValue: I aimed at the public's heart, and by accident I hit it in the stomach

Quote.Author: Eric Schlosser
Quote.QuoteValue: I never consciously set out to model myself after Upton Sinclair

Quote.Author: Eric Schlosser
Quote.QuoteValue: Journalists aren't supposed to be cheerleaders

Quote.Author: Eric Schlosser
Quote.QuoteValue: If you eat, you should be concerned about the people who are providing you with food

Quote.Author: Eric Schlosser
Quote.QuoteValue: I hadn't planned on being an activist

Quote.Author: Eric Schmidt
Quote.QuoteValue: The Internet is really about highly specialized information, highly specialized targeting

Quote.Author: Eric Schmidt
Quote.QuoteValue: We want to make sure the thing you're looking for is on Google 100 percent of the time

Quote.Author: Eric Schmidt
Quote.QuoteValue: Fast learners win

Quote.Author: Eric Schmidt
Quote.QuoteValue: The computing world is very good at things that we are not. It is very good at memory

Quote.Author: Eric Schmidt
Quote.QuoteValue: People are good at intuition, living our lives. What are computers good at? Memory

Quote.Author: Eric Schmidt
Quote.QuoteValue: In general in technology, if you own a platform that's valuable, you can monetize it

Quote.Author: Eric Schmidt
Quote.QuoteValue: There's nothing that cannot be found through some search engine or on the Internet somewhere

Quote.Author: Eric Schmidt
Quote.QuoteValue: Google is very much a not-invented-here, build-it-ourselves culture

Quote.Author: Eric Schmidt
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to fight for your privacy or you lose it

Quote.Author: Eric Schmidt
Quote.QuoteValue: Amazon has well passed any expectations of its ability to change distribution and marketing

Quote.Author: Eric Schneiderman
Quote.QuoteValue: Gambling is entertainment. People go to casinos to be entertained

Quote.Author: Eric Schneiderman
Quote.QuoteValue: Prosecutors are all used to people who commit fraud making wild accusations when they're caught

Quote.Author: Eric Schneiderman
Quote.QuoteValue: Organizing gives workers the power to lift themselves out of poverty and build a better future

Quote.Author: Eric Schneiderman
Quote.QuoteValue: My job is to enforce the law, without fear or favor

Quote.Author: Eric Schneiderman
Quote.QuoteValue: Daily fantasy sports is much closer to online poker than it is to traditional fantasy sports

Quote.Author: Eric Schneiderman
Quote.QuoteValue: Manufacturers must accept responsibility for their customers' safety

Quote.Author: Eric Schneiderman
Quote.QuoteValue: Unions go hand-in-hand with a strong middle class

Quote.Author: Eric Schneiderman
Quote.QuoteValue: There's nothing wrong with advocating for your own company

Quote.Author: Eric Schneiderman
Quote.QuoteValue: Prosecutors are all used to persons who commit fraud making wild accusations when they're caught

Quote.Author: Eric Schneiderman
Quote.QuoteValue: High-frequency traders are firms all around the world. They're massive investments

Quote.Author: Erica Jong
Quote.QuoteValue: And the trouble is, if you don't risk anything, you risk even more

Quote.Author: Erica Jong
Quote.QuoteValue: Advice is what we ask for when we already know the answer but wish we didn't

Quote.Author: Erica Jong
Quote.QuoteValue: Take your life in your own hands, and what happens? A terrible thing: no one to blame

Quote.Author: Erica Jong
Quote.QuoteValue: Show me a woman who doesn't feel guilty and I'll show you a man

Quote.Author: Erica Jong
Quote.QuoteValue: It is the city of mirrors, the city of mirages, at once solid and liquid, at once air and stone

Quote.Author: Erica Jong
Quote.QuoteValue: Jealousy is all the fun you think they had

Quote.Author: Erica Jong
Quote.QuoteValue: Solitude is un-American

Quote.Author: Erica Jong
Quote.QuoteValue: You take your life in your own hands, and what happens? A terrible thing: no one to blame

Quote.Author: Erica Jong
Quote.QuoteValue: You see a lot of smart guys with dumb women, but you hardly ever see a smart woman with a dumb guy

Quote.Author: Erica Jong
Quote.QuoteValue: Ambivalence is a wonderful tune to dance to. It has a rhythm all its own

Quote.Author: Erich Fromm
Quote.QuoteValue: Mother's love is peace. It need not be acquired, it need not be deserved

Quote.Author: Erich Fromm
Quote.QuoteValue: If I am what I have and if I lose what I have who then am I?

Quote.Author: Erich Fromm
Quote.QuoteValue: The task we must set for ourselves is not to feel secure, but to be able to tolerate insecurity

Quote.Author: Erich Fromm
Quote.QuoteValue: One cannot be deeply responsive to the world without being saddened very often

Quote.Author: Erich Fromm
Quote.QuoteValue: Creativity requires the courage to let go of certainties

Quote.Author: Erich Fromm
Quote.QuoteValue: As we ascend the social ladder, viciousness wears a thicker mask

Quote.Author: Erich Fromm
Quote.QuoteValue: The only truly affluent are those who do not want more than they have

Quote.Author: Erich Fromm
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is the only sane and satisfactory answer to the problem of human existence

Quote.Author: Erich Fromm
Quote.QuoteValue: There is only one meaning of life: the act of living itself

Quote.Author: Erich Fromm
Quote.QuoteValue: Sanity is only that which is within the frame of reference of conventional thought

Quote.Author: Erik Erikson
Quote.QuoteValue: The more you know yourself, the more patience you have for what you see in others

Quote.Author: Erik Erikson
Quote.QuoteValue: We are what we love

Quote.Author: Erik Erikson
Quote.QuoteValue: I am what survives of me

Quote.Author: Erik Erikson
Quote.QuoteValue: You've got to learn to accept the law of life, and face the fact that we disintegrate slowly

Quote.Author: Erik Erikson
Quote.QuoteValue: Doubt is the brother of shame

Quote.Author: Erik Erikson
Quote.QuoteValue: A man's conflicts represent what he 'really' is

Quote.Author: Erik Erikson
Quote.QuoteValue: The psychoanalytic method is essentially a historical method

Quote.Author: Erik Erikson
Quote.QuoteValue: The way you 'take history' is also a way of 'making history.'

Quote.Author: Erik Erikson
Quote.QuoteValue: Healthy children will not fear life if their elders have integrity enough not to fear death

Quote.Author: Erik Erikson
Quote.QuoteValue: We cannot leave history entirely to nonclinical observers and to professional historians

Quote.Author: Erika Christensen
Quote.QuoteValue: Work hard; be ethical

Quote.Author: Erika Christensen
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not straight up and down. I have curves

Quote.Author: Erika Christensen
Quote.QuoteValue: It was when I met everybody on 'The Perfect Score' that, like, nightclubs became a thing

Quote.Author: Erika Christensen
Quote.QuoteValue: There are photos of me with my Pony trucker hat, sideways. Truly, awesomely, horrible

Quote.Author: Erika Christensen
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been a good flier. I love the whole experience

Quote.Author: Erika Christensen
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm more proud of my upper body. Let's just say I'm a typical female in that way

Quote.Author: Erika Christensen
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a goody two-shoes who's never taken anything stronger than Tylenol

Quote.Author: Erika Christensen
Quote.QuoteValue: My buddy lost about 100 pounds cycling. He took me on a 31-mile loop. I was hooked

Quote.Author: Erika Christensen
Quote.QuoteValue: Having convenience when it comes to fueling your body is definitely an important thing

Quote.Author: Erika Christensen
Quote.QuoteValue: There are nearly 7 billion people on this planet, so there are a lot of characters to play

Quote.Author: Erin Heatherton
Quote.QuoteValue: Sexiness is all about your personality, being genuine and confident, and being a good person

Quote.Author: Erin Heatherton
Quote.QuoteValue: If you work hard and you do your best, you can do anything

Quote.Author: Erin Heatherton
Quote.QuoteValue: My style is simple, kinda girly, but with a bit of an edge

Quote.Author: Erin Heatherton
Quote.QuoteValue: I always stay active, even if I'm on vacation

Quote.Author: Erin Heatherton
Quote.QuoteValue: The most important thing for staying in shape is having fun with your workouts

Quote.Author: Erin Heatherton
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to work hard and see the results of my hard work

Quote.Author: Erin Heatherton
Quote.QuoteValue: There is just something about starting your day with something luxurious like a bath

Quote.Author: Erin Heatherton
Quote.QuoteValue: Love yourself no matter what!

Quote.Author: Erin Heatherton
Quote.QuoteValue: Rudeness, I think, is the worst

Quote.Author: Erin Heatherton
Quote.QuoteValue: I have way too many candles. There's always a candle burning at home

Quote.Author: Erin O'Connor
Quote.QuoteValue: I take my mentoring responsibilities very seriously

Quote.Author: Erin O'Connor
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm like a tourist when I'm in London

Quote.Author: Erin O'Connor
Quote.QuoteValue: I've enjoyed many camping holidays with my sister and her children, but we're pretty posh campers

Quote.Author: Erin O'Connor
Quote.QuoteValue: I am selective. If I do splash out, it's an investment, and I wear things for years

Quote.Author: Erin O'Connor
Quote.QuoteValue: It makes me cross when I hear people say, 'It's so last season.' I always say, 'It's vintage.'

Quote.Author: Erin O'Connor
Quote.QuoteValue: It's like recycling: selling old clothes to help make new ones

Quote.Author: Erin O'Connor
Quote.QuoteValue: I lead a very busy life and don't have a lot of time, so my skincare needs to be easy and portable

Quote.Author: Erin O'Connor
Quote.QuoteValue: Winter is my favourite season

Quote.Author: Erin O'Connor
Quote.QuoteValue: In my career, which has been fairly two-dimensional, people make decisions based on your persona

Quote.Author: Erin O'Connor
Quote.QuoteValue: As a model, part of my job is to be critiqued physically

Quote.Author: Ernie Harwell
Quote.QuoteValue: I think God always has the best for us

Quote.Author: Ernie Harwell
Quote.QuoteValue: In radio, they say, nothing happens until the announcer says it happens

Quote.Author: Ernie Harwell
Quote.QuoteValue: I look on life as a joyous adventure

Quote.Author: Ernie Harwell
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been lucky to broadcast some great events and to broadcast the exploits of some great players

Quote.Author: Ernie Harwell
Quote.QuoteValue: In my almost 92 years on this earth, the good Lord has blessed me with a great journey

Quote.Author: Ernie Harwell
Quote.QuoteValue: A tall, thin old man waving a scorecard from the corner of his dugout. That's baseball

Quote.Author: Ernie Harwell
Quote.QuoteValue: God blessed me by putting me here for thirty-one years at Michigan and Trumbull

Quote.Author: Ernie Harwell
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd like to be remembered as someone who showed up for the job. I consider myself a worker

Quote.Author: Ernie Harwell
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a great faith in God and Jesus

Quote.Author: Ernie Harwell
Quote.QuoteValue: Whatever happens, I'm ready to face it

Quote.Author: Erno Rubik
Quote.QuoteValue: We turn the Cube and it twists us

Quote.Author: Erno Rubik
Quote.QuoteValue: It was tremendously satisfying to watch this color parade

Quote.Author: Erno Rubik
Quote.QuoteValue: Now, after the Cube, I still don't have any plans to make anything like it

Quote.Author: Erno Rubik
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted nothing else than to make the object as perfect as possible

Quote.Author: Erno Rubik
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been passionate about geometry and the study of three-dimensional forms

Quote.Author: Erno Rubik
Quote.QuoteValue: I do not truly consider myself an icon, but the Cube has been quite successful

Quote.Author: Erno Rubik
Quote.QuoteValue: The Cube is an imitation of life itself - or even an improvement on life

Quote.Author: Erno Rubik
Quote.QuoteValue: Our whole life is solving puzzles

Quote.Author: Erno Rubik
Quote.QuoteValue: Usually we are saying only part of the truth

Quote.Author: Erno Rubik
Quote.QuoteValue: I was somewhat out of place among my classmates; I could not be as bohemian as they were

Quote.Author: Erykah Badu
Quote.QuoteValue: I love putting the music together. It's like art

Quote.Author: Erykah Badu
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not satisfied with the explanations I get from tv or from school

Quote.Author: Erykah Badu
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't read music or anything, so when I produce, I go basically by ear

Quote.Author: Erykah Badu
Quote.QuoteValue: I planned my success. I knew it was going to happen

Quote.Author: Erykah Badu
Quote.QuoteValue: Man, I don't want to have nothing to do with computers. I don't want the government in my business

Quote.Author: Erykah Badu
Quote.QuoteValue: The music business is motivated by money. Music is motivated by energy and feelings

Quote.Author: Erykah Badu
Quote.QuoteValue: Being honest is my job. That's what music is for me

Quote.Author: Erykah Badu
Quote.QuoteValue: Honey isn't really that good for you

Quote.Author: Erykah Badu
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a performance artist first; I'm a recording artist second

Quote.Author: Erykah Badu
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a Pisces, so I'm a very closed-book kind of person

Quote.Author: Estelle
Quote.QuoteValue: I come from a family of well-endowed booty women

Quote.Author: Estelle
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't please everybody. I give up. I'm not trying to. I don't care. Leave me alone with that

Quote.Author: Estelle
Quote.QuoteValue: My mom, for all intents and purposes, was a single parent

Quote.Author: Estelle
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm never scared to ask a question or state the obvious, y'know

Quote.Author: Estelle
Quote.QuoteValue: If you cannot smile when you listen to music, then do not listen to it!

Quote.Author: Estelle
Quote.QuoteValue: No one goes straight to happiness after a breakup

Quote.Author: Estelle
Quote.QuoteValue: Walking round the Champs-Elysees late at night is the greatest time

Quote.Author: Estelle
Quote.QuoteValue: I try not to judge because I've been judged a heck of a lot, and it don't feel nice

Quote.Author: Estelle
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe in illusion - I don't believe in magic

Quote.Author: Estelle
Quote.QuoteValue: Adele ain't soul

Quote.Author: Esther Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: What the public expects and what is healthy for an individual are two very different things

Quote.Author: Esther Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: The wisdom acquired with the passage of time is a useless gift unless you share it

Quote.Author: Esther Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: We can't all win Olympic medals. Even I never won one

Quote.Author: Esther Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: I took my daily swim at the Beverly Hills Hotel pool despite the presence of onlookers

Quote.Author: Esther Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: Clark Gable was the first to have called me a mermaid

Quote.Author: Esther Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: I was all in gold sequins for Million Dollar Mermaid, 50 feet in the air

Quote.Author: Esther Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: Which Esther Williams do you want to hear about?

Quote.Author: Esther Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: Critics established a snobbery toward me

Quote.Author: Esther Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: I gave my eardrums to MGM. And it's true: I really did

Quote.Author: Esther Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: Widowhood had done nothing to curb my smart mouth. So much for diplomacy

Quote.Author: Ethan Canin
Quote.QuoteValue: I like writing about the evil lurking in apparently good people

Quote.Author: Ethan Canin
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to write about the moment of light in the hour of darkness

Quote.Author: Ethan Canin
Quote.QuoteValue: Medicine ended up being the best thing I ever did for my writing

Quote.Author: Ethan Canin
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a beauty to math. Math is so simple. It's just one step after the next

Quote.Author: Ethan Canin
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm fascinated by power, by those that can be publicly generous and privately ruthless

Quote.Author: Ethan Canin
Quote.QuoteValue: Medicine is a supremely useful profession. Fiction writing is not

Quote.Author: Ethan Canin
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to be movie-star famous. I want to move people with my writing

Quote.Author: Ethan Canin
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a very bad memory. I can't remember my own life very well

Quote.Author: Ethan Canin
Quote.QuoteValue: No one knows why books do well

Quote.Author: Ethan Canin
Quote.QuoteValue: It's nice when critics say 'Emperor of the Air' is an important book of stories

Quote.Author: Ethel Merman
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything's coming up roses - for me

Quote.Author: Ethel Merman
Quote.QuoteValue: You gotta have a gimmick

Quote.Author: Ethel Merman
Quote.QuoteValue: When you are in deep conflict about something, sometimes the most trivial thing can tip the scales

Quote.Author: Ethel Merman
Quote.QuoteValue: Eisenhower was my war hero and the President I admire and respect most

Quote.Author: Ethel Merman
Quote.QuoteValue: At a flea market I always head for the junk jewelry table first

Quote.Author: Ethel Merman
Quote.QuoteValue: I can hold a note as long as the Chase National Bank

Quote.Author: Ethel Merman
Quote.QuoteValue: Broadway has been very good to me. But then, I've been very good to broadway

Quote.Author: Ethel Merman
Quote.QuoteValue: There's such a thing as theater discipline. One player doesn't appropriate another's inventions

Quote.Author: Ethel Merman
Quote.QuoteValue: Of my four marriages, the one to Bob Levitt is the only one I don't regret

Quote.Author: Ethel Merman
Quote.QuoteValue: Music, in the past few years... anything singable or understandable is square

Quote.Author: Etta James
Quote.QuoteValue: The only time that I am really truly happy - when I feel at my best - is when I'm on the stage

Quote.Author: Etta James
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't care who's playing. Even if it's my favorite artist, I'm probably not gonna go and see him

Quote.Author: Etta James
Quote.QuoteValue: But even so, I still get nervous before I go onstage

Quote.Author: Etta James
Quote.QuoteValue: Now I can stand up on the stage again like I used to after five years of sitting down while I sang

Quote.Author: Etta James
Quote.QuoteValue: I sing the songs that people need to hear

Quote.Author: Etta James
Quote.QuoteValue: It feels so good to be happy

Quote.Author: Etta James
Quote.QuoteValue: I took back my life

Quote.Author: Etta James
Quote.QuoteValue: I was a sloppy kid, wanted to be just wild

Quote.Author: Etta James
Quote.QuoteValue: My mother used to play nothing but Billie Holiday

Quote.Author: Etta James
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not starry eyed, and I'm not money crazy

Quote.Author: Eva Gabor
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is a game that two can play and both win

Quote.Author: Eva Gabor
Quote.QuoteValue: Marriage is too interesting an experiment to be tried only once

Quote.Author: Eva Gabor
Quote.QuoteValue: My co-workers expect me to be late and temperamental

Quote.Author: Eva Gabor
Quote.QuoteValue: The only thing you have to know are your words

Quote.Author: Eva Gabor
Quote.QuoteValue: I should have been smart enough to stay happy. But my ambition ruled my life

Quote.Author: Eva Gabor
Quote.QuoteValue: I love the fast lane

Quote.Author: Eva Gabor
Quote.QuoteValue: After all the work I've done, why should I suddenly be treated as a bona fide actress?

Quote.Author: Eva Gabor
Quote.QuoteValue: There was no way I could live in Hollywood and not become an actress

Quote.Author: Eva Gabor
Quote.QuoteValue: Most people don't need to work as hard as I do

Quote.Author: Eva Gabor
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always known I would be a success, but I was surprised at the way it came

Quote.Author: Evan Bayh
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes making progress a step at a time is better than no progress at all

Quote.Author: Evan Bayh
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes you have to make tough decisions to hold the line on spending

Quote.Author: Evan Bayh
Quote.QuoteValue: Hoosiers are very independent

Quote.Author: Evan Bayh
Quote.QuoteValue: What matters is moving forward and focusing on practical results for the American people

Quote.Author: Evan Bayh
Quote.QuoteValue: We know that a college degree is rapidly becoming the price of admission to the global economy

Quote.Author: Evan Bayh
Quote.QuoteValue: The United States depends on South Korea and Japan to help promote American values in East Asia

Quote.Author: Evan Bayh
Quote.QuoteValue: I intend to continue to fight for the things I think are right for my country

Quote.Author: Evan Bayh
Quote.QuoteValue: The most important area for spending restraint is entitlement reform

Quote.Author: Evan Bayh
Quote.QuoteValue: Families and businesses are tightening their belts to make ends meet - and Washington should too

Quote.Author: Evan Bayh
Quote.QuoteValue: Bob Corker's a very reasonable person

Quote.Author: Evan Osnos
Quote.QuoteValue: Living abroad has heightened my interest in how foreigners regard the strange places we encounter

Quote.Author: Evan Osnos
Quote.QuoteValue: To Confucius, harmony was consensus, not conformity. It required loyal opposition

Quote.Author: Evan Osnos
Quote.QuoteValue: Valuing the road over the goal was a Taoist goal in itself

Quote.Author: Evan Osnos
Quote.QuoteValue: Fact-checking can wreak havoc on Chinese political mythology

Quote.Author: Evan Osnos
Quote.QuoteValue: Being in a Chinese coal mine for 30 years is like an epic novel. It's tragic

Quote.Author: Evan Osnos
Quote.QuoteValue: Beijing has a glut of charming and traditional or brash and luxurious places to stay

Quote.Author: Evan Osnos
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been amazed at how fast and herd-like opinions in the United States are

Quote.Author: Evan Osnos
Quote.QuoteValue: I can tell you, going out to buy toilet paper in the U.S. is a completely predictable experience

Quote.Author: Evan Osnos
Quote.QuoteValue: I spent years overseas. I spent 11 years abroad

Quote.Author: Evan Osnos
Quote.QuoteValue: The United States, of course, in the late 19th century was extraordinarily corrupt

Quote.Author: Evan Spiegel
Quote.QuoteValue: There is real value in sharing moments that don't live forever

Quote.Author: Evan Spiegel
Quote.QuoteValue: More people are watching college football on Snapchat than they are on television

Quote.Author: Evan Spiegel
Quote.QuoteValue: It's important to be thoughtful and mindful about the things you say to other people

Quote.Author: Evan Spiegel
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a young, white, educated male. I got really, really lucky. And life isn't fair

Quote.Author: Evan Spiegel
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd like to create a space for people who have a lot of talent but not a lot of reach

Quote.Author: Evan Spiegel
Quote.QuoteValue: If I had a ringtone, it would probably be Neil Diamond

Quote.Author: Evan Spiegel
Quote.QuoteValue: I keep hearing about battery innovation, but it never makes it to my phone

Quote.Author: Evan Spiegel
Quote.QuoteValue: Cars bring me sheer joy

Quote.Author: Evan Spiegel
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not about working harder; it's about working the system

Quote.Author: Evan Spiegel
Quote.QuoteValue: Ephemeral should be the default

Quote.Author: Evangeline Lilly
Quote.QuoteValue: Your mind and soul are the kings of your physique way more than any exercise you do

Quote.Author: Evangeline Lilly
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm allergic to Hawaii. Everything there makes me react in some way

Quote.Author: Evangeline Lilly
Quote.QuoteValue: In your 20s you can be pretty, but you don't accomplish real beauty until you find wisdom and depth

Quote.Author: Evangeline Lilly
Quote.QuoteValue: I do feel like I'm at ease in my own skin when I find an androgynous balance

Quote.Author: Evangeline Lilly
Quote.QuoteValue: I just like short hair on women; I think it's cool

Quote.Author: Evangeline Lilly
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a classy dame
